mapper.insert:
insert into line_info
line_info.ballast_type,
line_info.commissioning_date,
line_info.create_time,
line_info.distance,
line_info.full_name,
line_info.gauge_type,
line_info.grade,
line_info.input_code, line_info.is_delete,
line_info.limit_grad,
line_info.line_branches,
line_info.line_code,
line_info.line_num,
line_info.min_radius_curve,
line_info.nature,
line_info.operate_type,
line_info.operator,
line_info.short_name,
line_info.status,
line_info.track_type,
line_info.traction_type,
line_info.update_time,
line_info.year_volume,
values
#{ballastType},
#{commissioningDate},
#{createTime},
#{distance},
#{fullName},
#{gaugeType},
#{grade},
#{inputCode}, #{isDelete},
#{limitGrad},
#{lineBranches},
#{lineCode},
#{lineNum},
#{minRadiusCurve},
#{nature},
#{operateType},
#{operator},
#{shortName},
#{status},
#{trackType},
#{tractionType},
#{updateTime},
#{yearVolume},
mapper.update:
update line_info
line_info.ballast_type = #{ballastType},
line_info.commissioning_date = #{commissioningDate},
line_info.create_time = #{createTime},
line_info.distance = #{distance},
line_info.full_name = #{fullName},
line_info.gauge_type = #{gaugeType},
line_info.grade = #{grade},
line_info.input_code = #{inputCode},
line_info.is_delete = #{isDelete},
line_info.limit_grad = #{limitGrad},
line_info.line_branches = #{lineBranches},
line_info.line_code = #{lineCode},
line_info.line_num = #{lineNum},
line_info.min_radius_curve = #{minRadiusCurve},
line_info.nature = #{nature},
line_info.operate_type = #{operateType},
line_info.operator = #{operator},
line_info.short_name = #{shortName},
line_info.status = #{status},
line_info.track_type = #{trackType},
line_info.traction_type = #{tractionType},
line_info.update_time = #{updateTime},
line_info.year_volume = #{yearVolume}
where line_info.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select line_info.ballast_type, line_info.commissioning_date, line_info.create_time, line_info.distance, line_info.full_name, line_info.gauge_type, line_info.grade, line_info.id, line_info.input_code, line_info.is_delete, line_info.limit_grad, line_info.line_branches, line_info.line_code, line_info.line_num, line_info.min_radius_curve, line_info.nature, line_info.operate_type, line_info.operator, line_info.short_name, line_info.status, line_info.track_type, line_info.traction_type, line_info.update_time, line_info.year_volume form line_info where line_info.id = #{id}
